attributes.action: Prohibit Banks and Mortgage providers from charging extortionate product fees and charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some companies are charging ridiculous fees even if you stay with the company for a re-mortgage and they shouldn't be allowed to. I believe if some fees were reduced this would allow more people to obtain a mortgage and also keep their repayments affordable.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
